name: AMERICAN CULTURAL RESOURCES ASSOCIATION (ACRA)
description: Supporting the business needs of the cultural resource management industry
sampleDescriptions: Opposed some aspects of the Administration's infrastructure plan and suggested alternative ways that Congress could better ensure protection of historic resources while investing in infrastructure dev
Asked Members of Congress to support increases in funding for the Historic Preservation Fund in the Fiscal Year 2019 Interior appropriations bill.
Share information on how to protect cultural resources in any future legislation aimed at growing America's infrastructure.

Advocate for increases in appropriations to the Historic Preservation Fund and other preservation programs in the Department of the Interior. 
Request support for HR 1179, the African American Burial
